TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You eat it and feel no taste.

I wish to go to Amsterdam Schiphol's aviation store

Edited August 2, 2023 by Aerodynamic Kerbal
This page is newer than the previous one

granted: but the onion wasnt sliced enough

 

i wish for a wand that makes anything i want appear

Granted. Recursion happened. You are buried under the hill of self-reproducing wands.

I wish the hill was wanderful.

Granted, the wanderful becomes a hill and that hill sells propane and propane accessories. (Points if you get the reference

110708022023

Granted, you get 110708022023 oxygen molecules to breathe. Use them sparingly.

I wish for a Gadget.

Granted you get:

i wish for a shepherds pie

113808022023

Granted. It's not made by a brit though.

7 hours ago, Aerodynamic Kerbal said:

I wish to go to Amsterdam Schiphol's aviation store

(I'm wishing this again because SOMEONE DECIDED TO SKIP MY REPLY)

Granted but its closed.

i wish for a good thunderstorm

120308022023

Granted but they're all out of your favorite plane.

I wish someone skips my reply.

EDIT: Ninja'd

Granted. The Earth is covered in huge thunderstorms that rain down an endless downpour of water. Lightning on a scale never seen before destroys millions of structures. By the time the storm ends, a decade long global drought begins, turning the world into a wasteland.

I wish for soft serve ice cream.

EDIT: Ninja'd, again!!!

Edited August 2, 2023 by TwoCalories

Granted. The thunderstorm is at the other side if the globe.

I wish

Granted i get a bad thunderstorm that gives 5 full inches of rain!

i wish for irish cheddar

(ive been ninjad so its a double skip and double grant! And just incase i get irish swiss cheese rofl)

120708022023

Granted, everything in the universe disappears except for you because you wished for nothing.

I wish for soft serve ice cream.

EDIT: Ninja'd for the third time in like five minutes. HOW???

Edited August 2, 2023 by TwoCalories

Granted you get milk

i wish for an image of the moment of the big bang itself not just its echo (the cosmic microwave background radiation image)

121008022023

Granted. Its from the first zeptosecond. 

I wish for some (I mean 100 tons of) cheddar right now

Granted but its 100 tons of just molded rotten cheddar

i wish to see the sea that saw the see that saw the saw that sawed the wood that would be chucked by woodchuck that chucked the chuck that chucked the drill that drilled a drill that drilled the drill.

Granted. AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA

I wish for something funny to happen.

Granted! You keep getting ninjad by me it seems

i wish to be not

121708022023

Granted. You are not but then yes.

I wish I could turn everything I touch into cheddar

Granted, you turn everything including yourself into cheddar.

i wish to pass go and to collect 200,000,000,000,000$

123508022023

Granted, but before you could collect $200T, you've run out of Monopoly money provided by the board game. So, you buy more and more Monopoly boards to get $200T. You finally manage to get your $200T in Monopoly money, but you have spent a total of $340,136,054,405 in real money. Enjoy finding something that can be bought with Monopoly Banknotes.

I wish for a pizza.

spelling

Granted you get a pizza that has mushroom ketchup as a sauce and durian as a topping.

no, mushroom ketchup is NOT what youre thinking. Its this:

Granted, you get Durian Pie

i wish to see a few meteors after critical role Campaign 3 Episode 67 ends tonight
